description: Metrics configuration for noise removal evaluation

psnr.name: Peak Signal-to-Noise Ratio
psnr.description: Measures signal quality; higher values indicate less degradation

ssim.name: Structural Similarity Index
ssim.description: Perceptual metric; closer to 1 indicates better structural preservation

mse.name: Mean Squared Error
mse.description: Average squared difference; lower values indicate better match

mae.name: Mean Absolute Error
mae.description: Average absolute difference; lower values indicate better match

notes: Baseline metrics verify implementation correctness (should be perfect)
Noisy metrics quantify degradation from each noise type
Compare denoised vs noisy to measure improvement
